SEARCH
Package de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.configstuff

Klasse ConfigUpdater

java.lang.Object
de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.configstuff.ConfigUpdater
public class ConfigUpdater extends Object
A class to update/add new sections/keys to your config while keeping your current values and keeping your comments Algorithm: Read the new file and scan for comments and ignored sections, if ignored section is found it is treated as a comment. Read and write each line of the new config, if the old config has value for the given key it writes that value in the new config. If a key has an attached comment above it, it is written first.
Autor:
tchristofferson

  • Methodendetails

    • update

      public static void update(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin, String resourceName, File toUpdate, List<String> ignoredSections) throws IOException

      Updates a YAML configuration file by merging new structure from a plugin resource while preserving existing values and comments. This method intelligently combines the latest configuration template with user customizations.

      The update process:

      • Loads the new configuration template from plugin resources
      • Preserves all existing user values from the current file
      • Maintains comments and formatting where possible
      • Ignores specified sections to prevent overwriting sensitive data
      • Handles special version keys for language files
      
 List<String> ignoredSections = Arrays.asList("database", "custom-settings");
 ConfigUpdater.update(plugin, "config.yml", configFile, ignoredSections);
 // Config file now has latest structure with preserved user values
      Parameter:
      plugin - the plugin instance providing access to bundled resources
      resourceName - the name of the YAML resource file to use as template
      toUpdate - the target configuration file to update
      ignoredSections - list of configuration section paths to preserve unchanged
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if file reading, writing, or resource access fails
